name: DotStrike
description:
DotStrike is a 3D shooter that can be played from either top-down or first-person perspective. The players are colored dots with a tapered nose. Players are divided into two teams: red and blue.

At the moment there is only one game mode - team confrontation. By the time of release, I plan to add more game modes, as well as ground and air vehicles.

Play with your friends on your local network or on the Internet!

At the moment, the game is being actively developed in free time from the main work.
If you like the game, add it to your wishlist. As soon as the game is released, you will be the first to know about it!
